name: Once Upon A Toy
description:
An adventure game in which you embody a child telling himself a story in his bedroom.

You have to control alternatively the child or the toy to progress through the story.

GAMEPLAY

CONTROLS (Xbox controller)

Left Stick : Move

A : Jump

RB : Crouch

X : Interact / Drop / Reset car

B : Enter car

Y : Switch character

Start :   Open menu
